channel.title: Twitter @LangChain
channel.description:
⚡ Build context-aware, reasoning applications ⚡

item.title: RT Jo Kristian Bergum: Playing with @LangChainAI and Vespa streaming mode with multi-vector representations. LangChain has evolved for the better over...
item.description:
RT Jo Kristian Bergum
Playing with @LangChainAI and Vespa streaming mode with multi-vector representations.

LangChain has evolved for the better over the last few months, with fewer "magic" hidden prompts, and the LangChain Expression Language (LCEL) reminds me of Vespa indexing language.
item.author: LangChain

item.title: ⭐️Building RAG Pipelines that Use Multiple LLMs: Query Transformation ⭐️ Many advanced RAG pipelines make multiple calls to LLMs at various stages...
item.description:
⭐️Building RAG Pipelines that Use Multiple LLMs: Query Transformation ⭐️

Many advanced RAG pipelines make multiple calls to LLMs at various stages. Most existing templates currently use the same LLM for all stages, but there's no reason that has to be the case.

Over the coming… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1731724086072779109
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Jacob Lee: 📐 Gradient LLMs + Embeddings 📐 You can swap in @Gradient_AI_ private, custom-trained LLMs and embeddings into your @LangChainAI �...
item.description:
RT Jacob Lee
📐 Gradient LLMs + Embeddings 📐

You can swap in @Gradient_AI_ private, custom-trained LLMs and embeddings into your @LangChainAI 🦜🔗 JS/TS projects!

This also includes support for model adapters.

Thank you to @ChaseMcDou!

https://js.langchain.com/docs/integrations/llms/gradient_ai
item.author: LangChain

item.title: 🦜🛠️ LangSmith Tutorials We've added a lot of functionality to LangSmith! If you want to get caught up on it, we've added a 7 part YouTube serie...
item.description:
🦜🛠️ LangSmith Tutorials

We've added a lot of functionality to LangSmith! If you want to get caught up on it, we've added a 7 part YouTube series covering:

✒️Tracing
📊Evaluation
🌐Hub
🏷️Data Annotation
... and more!

Check it out here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bOaDQUCgKjw&list=PLfaIDFEXuae2CjNiTeqXG5r8n9rld9qQu
item.author: LangChain

item.title: 🌌 🛝 Multimodal support in LangSmith Playground With the announcement of GPT-4-vision models, it has never been easier to convert rough sketches ...
item.description:
🌌 🛝 Multimodal support in LangSmith Playground

With the announcement of GPT-4-vision models, it has never been easier to convert rough sketches into runnable prototypes.

Nevertheless, a simple prompt may not suffice, and prompt engineering can guide the LLM to yield better… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1731707919530406121

item.title: RT Stan Girard: 15 seconds to chat with a 200-page long document ?! 🔥 If you don’t trust me, trust the video of @quivr_brain 😏 Powered by @Lang...
item.description:
RT Stan Girard
15 seconds to chat with a 200-page long document ?! 🔥

If you don’t trust me, trust the video of @quivr_brain 😏

Powered by @LangChainAI & @supabase (PGVector).

It even works with @Ollama_ai! So fully private!

Code: https://github.com/stangirard/quivr
item.author: LangChain

item.title: 🦜Retrieval-Augmented Generation: From Theory to LangChain Implementation 👏We've really been enjoying @helloiamleonie's articles lately Check out...
item.description:
🦜Retrieval-Augmented Generation: From Theory to LangChain Implementation

👏We've really been enjoying @helloiamleonie's articles lately

Check out this fantastic blog covering the basics of RAG, the theory behind it, and how to use it in practice

Blog: https://towardsdatascience.com/retrieval-augmented-generation-rag-from-theory-to-langchain-implementation-4e9bd5f6a4f2

item.title: RT Apify: 🔍 Need to extract vital information locked away in PDF documents for your AI projects? Here's a solution! 🤖 Apify's PDF Text Extractor...
item.description:
RT Apify
🔍 Need to extract vital information locked away in PDF documents for your AI projects? Here's a solution! 🤖 Apify's PDF Text Extractor + 🦜🔗 @LangChainAI! Read the tutorial below to find out how to combine them for QA from PDF docs👇

item.title: RT Miguel Otero Pedrido: Another fun project I made using @LangChainAI ! In this case, it's a library I created that checks for undocumented functions...
item.description:
RT Miguel Otero Pedrido
Another fun project I made using @LangChainAI !

In this case, it's a library I created that checks for undocumented functions / classes in your python project and generates docstrings for each one.

Code: https://github.com/MichaelisTrofficus/gpt4docstrings
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT João Moura: AI Agents building a landing page from 1 line idea. CrewAI uses @LangChainAI I’m using langchain tools and the LangSmith for logging ...
item.description:
RT João Moura
AI Agents building a landing page from 1 line idea.
CrewAI uses @LangChainAI I’m using langchain tools and the LangSmith for logging it ✨

🧠 GPT4 & OpenHermes2.5 (with @Ollama_ai)

Will opensource this weekend🤞 reply to let me know if you wanna a more in depth tutorial/video

item.description:
RT Mo Gharabat 🦇
OpenCopilot is at 3.1K GitHub stars! ⭐⭐

https://github.com/openchatai/OpenCopilot

And I have 3 good news:

- Our new dashboard is available on the cloud (yes you can test it out!)
- The planning engine is better than before
- You can trace and see all chat conversations on your copilots

You… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1731048690658226393

item.description:

item.title: RT Jacob Lee: 🗺️ Google Places Tool 🗺️ Your LangChain.js agents and chains can now pull in local information with the @Google Places API! Use ...
item.description:
RT Jacob Lee
🗺️ Google Places Tool 🗺️

Your LangChain.js agents and chains can now pull in local information with the @Google Places API!

Use it to find addresses, websites, and more from text about a location in @LangChainAI 🦜🔗 JS/TS 0.0.200.

Thank you SananR!

https://js.langchain.com/docs/integrations/tools/google_places
item.author: LangChain

item.title: A great overview of how we added long term memory to OpenGPTs!!
item.description:
A great overview of how we added long term memory to OpenGPTs!!


Shubham Saboo: OpenGPT meets Generative Agents to get Long term Memory 🤯

Opensource community is once again ahead of the curve, breaking new ground in building custom GPTs. This time, it's about adding long-term memory to OpenGPT.

Here's everything you need to know:

1. Specialized Long-Term… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1730810920207622610

RT Afiz ⚡️

Complete source code 🧵👇

item.title: RT James Briggs: Free course from @DataCamp! Covering essentials of LLMs through to building full AI pipelines with @LangChainAI @pinecone and more :)
item.description:
RT James Briggs
Free course from @DataCamp! Covering essentials of LLMs through to building full AI pipelines with @LangChainAI @pinecone and more :)


DataCamp: Whether you're completely new to AI or are looking to add generative AI skills to your tool belt, we've designed these codealongs for coders by coders.

Anyone with intermediate Python knowledge can jump in and start learning.

item.description:
RT Shreyas Karnik
🚀 Wrote about "Local LLMs as Browser Sidekicks" 👉 https://kshreyas.dev/post/local-llms/
Introducing 'DistiLlama': A browser extension bringing AI power to your fingertips. Built with @Ollama_ai @LangChainAI and @huggingface Check out https://github.com/shreyaskarnik/DistiLlama #privacy #LLMs #GenAI

item.title: RT Loïc A. Royer 💻🔬⚗️ 🇺🇦: 🚨 #ChatGPT + @napari_imaging 🚨 Releasing my latest weekend project: Omega, an autonomous LLM agent that...
item.description:
RT Loïc A. Royer 💻🔬⚗️ 🇺🇦
🚨 #ChatGPT + @napari_imaging 🚨
Releasing my latest weekend project: Omega, an autonomous LLM agent that writes image processing and analysis code, fixes its mistakes, accesses the napari viewer, makes widgets, & more!
http://github.com/royerlab/napari-chatgpt
@LangChainAI @OpenAI
#OmegaAgent
